§ 70903. International Space Station research The Administrator shall—(1) carry out a program of microgravity research consistent with section 40904 of this title; and
(2) consider the need for a life sciences centrifuge and any associated holding facilities.
(Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3436.)
